TITLE: Tu librería personal
USER_HAS_BOOKS: {firstName} {lastName} tiene {numBooks, number, integer} {numBooks, plural, one {libro} other {libros}}.
USER_HAS_BOOKS_DENOTED: {firstName} {lastName} tiene <input id='numBooksInput' type='text' value='{numBooks, number, integer}' pattern='[0-9]*'> {numBooks, plural, one {libro} other {libros}}.
USER_WILL_SELL: {firstName} {numBooks, plural, one {lo} other {los}} va a vender el {dateBooks, date, long} a {price, number, USD}.
USER_WILL_SELL_DENOTED: {firstName} {numBooks, plural, one {lo} other {los}} va a vender el {dateBooks, date, long} a {price, number, USD}.
SUBSCRIPTION_WARNING: Warning: you have only {numDays, number, integer} {numDays, plural, one {day} other {days}} left in your subscription.
TRAVEL: {firstName} {lastName} viajará a Perú el {travelDate, date, long} por {price, number, EUR}
